rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, His Majesty is absent...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0002
rows.name:
A shame. You were hoping to
meet him again, weren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0003
rows.name:
It feels a little strange for me to
think of it as "again," but I did
wish to meet with him, yes.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0004
rows.name:
I remember the old you, standing
tranquilly beside the throne...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0005
rows.name: Quiet, and resolved.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0006
rows.name:
I can sense it is
a good memory for you...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0007
rows.name:
I had hoped some memory might linger
within you too, but alas. It seems not.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0008
rows.name: So it would appear...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0009
rows.name:
Unlike you, Kagutsuchi, I did not have
past records to fall back on.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0010
rows.name:
Without any data, it is difficult to feel
any emotional connection either.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0011
rows.name:
And now you're prohibited
from reading those records
that do exist, as well...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0012
rows.name: So I am, so I am...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0013
rows.name:
Therefore I know not what I had been
doing, nor what my role is in the
Superbian Empire.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0014
rows.name:
I can comprehend some of it by talking
with you or Meleph, but I feel sure there
is much of importance I do not grasp.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0015
rows.name:
Hence my plan: to ask Emperor Nefer
why it was that he forbade me from
reading the past records.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0016
rows.name:
Do you have any idea what the
reason might be?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0017
rows.name: I wonder...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0018
rows.name: Why would he place such a restriction?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0019
rows.name: As a sign of demotion.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0020
rows.name: So I'd save the world, not the Empire.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0101
rows.name:
From what I hear, it seems I failed
to keep the Emperor safe, yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0102
rows.name:
In which case, might it not mean I have
been relieved of the duty to protect
His Majesty?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0103
rows.name: That's very pessimistic.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0104
rows.name:
You always are too hard on
yourself, Wadatsumi.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0105
rows.name:
I think Emperor Nefer was hoping you
would protect Alst, and not just him.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0106
rows.name:
Rather than keep someone as excellent
as you cooped up in Superbia...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0107
rows.name:
he preferred to have you contribute to
the well-being of the world at large.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0108
rows.name: Hm. I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0109
rows.name:
He thought my knowing my past role
in Superbia would hinder that...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0110
rows.name: That's what I think.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0201
rows.name:
This may be presumptuous
to suggest, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0202
rows.name:
He may have thought that I should
work for the good of Alst, rather
than just for the Empire?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0203
rows.name:
You mean, that an adept Blade should
serve the world, not a single country?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0204
rows.name: Yes, precisely.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0205
rows.name: You can be quite brazen sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0206
rows.name: I was hesitant to say it myself...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0207
rows.name: But I do think you're probably right.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0208
rows.name:
That's why the Emperor didn't want
you to know too much about your
role here.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0209
rows.name:
He feared if you did, it may hinder you
from achieving that purpose.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0301
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0302
rows.name:
I may not have been able to meet
the Emperor, but just talking to you,
Kagutsuchi, has given me strength.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0303
rows.name: Always glad to help.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0304
rows.name:
For what it's worth, I can't wait for the
day when you're back by the side
of the throne.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0305
rows.name: Are you worried for him?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0306
rows.name: Maybe somewhat.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0307
rows.name:
Anyone can aid the Emperor in his
duties, but to keep him safe takes
someone truly special.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0308
rows.name:
Up until now, I felt secure knowing
that His Majesty was protected by
myself, Meleph-sama, and you.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0309
rows.name:
Certainly...
The sooner things fall back into place,
the better.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0310
rows.name:
When all is said and done, I will
return to the throne room...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0311
rows.name:
You and me both, Kagutsuchi.
We will help see this through.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0312
rows.name:
Right.
I'll be counting on you.
